arts.ttl: Fiorentina vs. Juventus: no room for error
arts.sum: There have been 97 official meetings between the two teams in Florence: Fiorentina have won 33 (the most recent a 3–0 victory last season), there have been 37 draws (the last a 1–1 in Serie A 2022/23) and 27 Juventus wins (the most recent a 1–0 in Serie A 2023/24). Juventus are the team with the most different scorers in Serie A 2025/26 (11, like Inter), and the one that has scored the most goals through substitutes (4).
